creator: FlipFlop Apps
descriptionHtml:
Halfchess is a casual chess game - it is faster and easier. The games are 5 mins long. There are 100+ levels and two player matches with Elo scoring. And more -

Blind mode - Your pieces disappear after 3 moves
Crab mode - A new chess piece crab moves Zig-Zag


Read the rules and enjoy our game.

New Rules
=========
1. Stalemate is NOT draw - it is victory.
2. Pawn is promoted to a Queen.
3. No casteling.
4. Optional checkmate - down your opponent to a King and claim victory.

Read about crab inside the app.
descriptionShort: A mobile sized chess board, disappearing chess pieces and new characters.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1D Skylark Apartments,
DDA SFS Flats Site 2,
Gazipur,
New Delhi 110096
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This build introduces blind mode for two player games and for local games. There are also several UI improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* We made the UI and onboarding more exciting.
* You can progress through the stages much faster.

* Overall, we are always making improvements.

title: Half Chess game - snacking on chess

container.value:
1D Skylark Apartments,
DDA SFS Flats Site 2,
Gazipur,
New Delhi 110096

creator: FlipFlop Apps
descriptionHtml:
Fast Chess for Busy People

Designed for those who want to get better at chess but don't find enough time to practice. HalfChess is played on half the board where each game lasts just five minutes.

Deliberate Practice for End Games

150 stages of varying difficulty levels so you can practice valuable end game skills such as deep thinking, fast-thinking, pushing opponent pieces, and reducing their attach area.

Improve Focus and Memory

Playing blind chess will help you sharpen memory and focusing skills. In blind mode, the chess pieces disappear after a few moves (as in the screenshot).

New rules to the age-old Chess

HalfChess changes two rules of chess, as do the chess variants.

1. You stalemate your opponent, and you win (Not a draw)
2. No castling

Notable achievements

HalfChess was at the 12th position at Pioneer.app startup competition, among hundreds of global participants. We have also received media coverage from YourStory.com.

Website - https://halfchess.com
Support - flipflopapps@gmail.com
Twitter Me - @navalsaini
descriptionShort: A mobile-sized chess to practice end-games and memory skills while playing.

appDetails.developerAddress:
1D Skylark Apartments,
DDA SFS Flats Site 2,
Gazipur,
New Delhi 110096
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Fixes 2 player games
* Improves app performance

Fast Chess for Busy People

Designed for those who want to get better at chess but don't find enough time to practice. HalfChess is played on half the board where each game lasts just five minutes. It features,

● NEW! Teacher mode helps you teach chess to someone

● 100+ levels against AI
● Two player mode with ELO scoring
● Blind mode pieces disappear after 3 moves


Teacher mode

Teach your kid, friend or partner to learn how to play chess while playing games with them on the Halfchess app. You can do this in a cafe or on the move.

Deliberate Practice for End Games

150 stages of varying difficulty levels so you can practice valuable end game skills such as deep thinking, fast-thinking, pushing opponent pieces, and reducing their attach area.

Teach chess to your kid, friend or partner while playing games with them on the Halfchess app. You can do this in a cafe or on the move. Learning by playing is fun and a bonding experience between two players.

● 100+ stages to practice against AI on a smaller board
● Blind mode pieces disappear after 3 moves

Please feel free to reach out with any improvement requests or ideas.

It unique features are:-

● 100+ stages to practice against AI on a smaller board
● Blind mode pieces disappear after 3 moves
● NEW! 2-player games and a community

Please feel free to reach out with any improvement requests or ideas.

Teacher mode

Teach your kid, friend or partner to learn how to play chess while playing games with them on the Halfchess app. You can do this in a cafe or on the move.

Deliberate Practice for End Games

150 stages of varying difficulty levels so you can practice valuable end game skills such as deep thinking, fast-thinking, pushing opponent pieces, and reducing their attach area.

Improve Focus and Memory

Playing blind chess will help you sharpen memory and focusing skills. In blind mode, the chess pieces disappear after a few moves (as in the screenshot).

New rules to the age-old Chess

HalfChess changes two rules of chess, as do the chess variants.

1. You stalemate your opponent, and you win (Not a draw)
2. No castling

Notable achievements

HalfChess was at the 12th position at Pioneer.app startup competition, among hundreds of global participants. We have also received media coverage from YourStory.com.

Website - https://halfchess.com
Support - flipflopapps@gmail.com
Twitter Me - @navalsaini
